alert.note: Alert for Garfield; Holt; Loup; Wheeler (Nebraska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 28 at 1:44AM CDT by NWS NorthPlatte
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of east central Loup, Garfield, southern Holt and western Wheeler Counties through 230 AM CDT... At 144 AM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Calamus Reservoir State Recreation Area, or 9 miles northeast of Taylor, moving east at 40 mph. HAZARD...Penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Ericson, Calamus Reservoir State Recreation Area, Homestead Knolls Campground, Virginia Smith Dam, Horseshoe Bend Lake, Hannamon Bayou Campground, Buffalo Flats, Nunda Shoal Campground, Deverre, Valley View Flat Campground and Gables. This includes the following highways... Highway 183 between mile markers 129 and 139. Highway 281 near mile marker 156, and between mile markers 158 and 159. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...<30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. To report severe weather, contact your nearest law enforcement agency. They will relay your report to the National Weather Service office in North Platte. Persons in campgrounds should consider seeking sturdy shelter until this storm passes.
